compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application

/home/software/url-shortener/serverless..serviceRawFile:
service: url-shortener

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x
  region: us-east-2
  environment:
    TABLE_NAME: UrlTable
  iamRoleStatements:
    - Effect: Allow
      Action:
        - dynamodb:PutItem
        - dynamoDB:GetItem
      Resource:
        - arn:aws:dynamodb:us-east-2:*:table/UrlTable 

functions:
  createUrl:
    handler: handler.createUrl
    events:
      - http:
          path: shorten
          method: post
  getUrl:
    handler: handler.getUrl
    events:
      - http:
          path: /{shortId}
          method: get

resources:
  Resources:
    UrlTable:
      Type: AWS::DynamoDB::Table
      Properties:
        TableName: UrlTable
        AttributeDefinitions:
          - AttributeName: shortId
            AttributeType: S
        KeySchema:
          - AttributeName: shortId
            KeyType: HASH
        BillingMode: PAY_PER_REQUEST

compiledCloudFormationTemplate.Description: The AWS CloudFormation template for this Serverless application
